      • studentLogin

        public int studentLogin()
                 throws java.sql.SQLException,
                        java.io.IOException,
                        SearchFailedException

        Login for an existing user

        Checks if the user already exists

        Returns:
        returns 1 if the user login is successful; 0 if the login fails
        Throws:
        SearchFailedException - The exception that is thrown a problem occurs in fetching user details from database
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.io.IOException

      • studentSignUp

                   throws java.sql.SQLException,
                          java.io.IOException,
                          SearchFailedException,
                          CreateFailedException

        Sign Up for a new user

        Adds a new user

        Throws:
        SearchFailedException - The exception that is thrown if a problem occurs in fetching user details from database
        CreateFailedException - The exception that is thrown if the new user is not created
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.io.IOException

      • answerOpenQuestion

        public void answerOpenQuestion(java.util.List<Question> questionList)
                        throws CreateFailedException,
                               ReadFailedException,
                               java.sql.SQLException,
                               java.io.IOException

        Method to answer open questions for a quiz

        Displays the open questions corresponding to the chosen quiz

        Puts the answers in the table as the user answers to the questions in the answer table

        The answers are recorded with the corresponding quiz_id, question_id and the student_id

        Writes the quiz content to a file

        Parameters:
        questionList - The list of questions corresponding to the chosen quiz
        Throws:
        CreateFailedException - The exception that is thrown when the answer is not stored in the table
        ReadFailedException - The exception that is thrown when the questions are not fetched from the table
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.io.IOException

      • answerMCQQuestion

        public void answerMCQQuestion(java.util.List<MCQQuestion> mcqQuestionList)
                       throws ReadFailedException,
                              java.sql.SQLException,
                              java.io.IOException

        Method to answer MCQ questions for a quiz

        Displays the MCQ questions corresponding to the chosen quiz

        Displays the MCQ choices for the question

        The user answers a question by typing in the number of the answer. Checks for invalid answers and prompts the user to enter the correct values

        Checks the validity of the answer and keeps track of the score with a counter

        Displays the MCQ score at the end

        Writes the quiz content to a file

        Parameters:
        mcqQuestionList - List of the MCQ Question corresponding to the chosen quiz
        Throws:
        ReadFailedException - Exception that is thrown if the data is not fetched from the table
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.io.IOException

      • takeQuizByQuizList

        public void takeQuizByQuizList()
                        throws java.sql.SQLException,
                               DataAccessException,
                               java.io.IOException,
                               BadInputException

        Method to take a quiz from a list of quizzes

        Displays a list of the available quizzes

        The user chooses the quiz by entering the quiz number

        Throws:
        DataAccessException - The exception that is thrown if there is a problem with the access to the table
        BadInputException
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.io.IOException

      • choiceMenu

        public void choiceMenu()
                throws java.sql.SQLException,
                       DataAccessException,
                       java.io.IOException,
                       BadInputException

        Generates the student choice menu

        A student can take a quiz by topics or choose a quiz from a list of quizzes

        Throws:
